job.title: Unity Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Unity Software Engineer – Perm – Remote </p><p><br></p><p>The end client is unable to sponsor or transfer visas for this position; all parties authorized to work in the US without sponsorship are encouraged to apply.</p><p><br></p><p>Our Client is seeking a Unity Software Engineer.</p><p><br></p><p>Role Description</p><p><br></p><p>• Building and debugging frameworks, tools, and applications.</p><p>• Tracking and reporting on project status.</p><p>• Interfacing closely with various teams including quality assurance, server developers, machine learning engineers, and business managers to translate requirements and constraints into native software.</p><p>• Working with the team to identify and implement data-driven improvements to systems and processes.</p><p>• Clearly communicating with the team progress made, define deliverables, and help set timelines.</p><p>• Working on code remediation and improving application performance.</p><p>• Collaboration with team members (Quality Assurance, Development, Operations) to determine possible solutions for any problems or issues</p><p><br></p><p>Skills &amp; Requirements</p><p><br></p><p>• 6+ years of experience shipping production-grade C# and Unity applications.</p><p>• Hands-on experience with mixed reality, AR &amp; VR development.</p><p>• Understanding of how to keep app performance and user experience a top priority.</p><p>• Familiarity and a general understanding of front-end/back-end web development, cloud platforms, and web stack development is a plus.</p><p>• Self-starter with a mindset of continuous improvement and growth.</p><p>• Experience with team application development, CI/CD, and VCS systems like GitHub.</p><p>• Comfort with incremental code testing and deployment.</p><p>• Strong communication skills and ability to work in a fast-paced small team environment.</p><p>• Education: BS/BE in CS or equivalent.</p><p><br></p><p>Why Hays?</p><p><br></p><p>You will be working with a professional recruiter who has intimate knowledge of the Information Technology industry and market trends . Your Hays recruiter will lead you through a thorough screening process in order to understand your skills, experience, needs, and drivers. You will also get support on resume writing, interview tips, and career planning, so when there’s a position you really want, you’re fully prepared to get it.</p><p><br></p><p>Nervous about an upcoming interview? Unsure how to write a new resume?</p><p><br></p><p>Visit the Hays Career Advice section to learn top tips to help you stand out from the crowd when job hunting.</p><p><br></p><p>Hays is an Equal Opportunity Employer.</p><p><br></p><p>Drug testing may be required; please contact a recruiter for more information.</p>
